mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board(iuser, board_code, title, contents) VALUES(#{iuser}, #{boardCode}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT a.iboard, b.iuser, a.title, b.nm, a.contents, DATE_FORMAT(a.created_at, '%Y.%m.%d') createdAt FROM t_board a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.iuser = b.iuser WHERE a.iboard = #{iboard}
